root.name: Insane 2
root.description: The game consists of 18 vehicles, 20 locations, 170 races over 4 continents and has a variety of 10 game modes.System RequirementsOS: Windows XP (SP2), Vista (SP1), 7Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2Memory: 1 GB RAM (1.5 GB for Vista/7)Hard Disk Space: 1.2 GB Free HDD spaceVideo Card: GeForce 7900GTX/ATI RADEON X1900 XT or higherDirectXÂ®: 9.0c
